def_en: If you swap something with someone, you give it to them and receive a different thing in exchange.

def_cn: 用…替换;把…换成;停下(手头的事)改做
def_en: If you swap one thing for another, you remove the first thing and replace it with the second, or you stop doing the first thing and start doing the second.

def_cn: 交流，交换(意见);互相讲述(故事)
def_en: If you swap stories or opinions with someone, you tell each other stories or give each other your opinions.
